title: National Renewable Energy Laboratory (NREL) Home Page
description: The only federal laboratory dedicated to research, development, commercialization, and deployment of renewable energy and energy efficiency technologies.
cleaned_text: The National Renewable Energy Laboratory (NREL) is transforming energy through research, development, commercialization, and deployment of renewable energy and energy efficiency technologies. [Partner with us](/workingwithus/index.html) to accelerate the transition of renewable energy and energy efficiency technologies to the marketplace. Find NREL-developed data sets, maps, models, and tools used for the analysis of energy and energy efficiency technologies. Explore our current job postings, which include research positions and other career opportunities in a variety of fields. Learn about the basics of our research areas—bioenergy, geothermal, hydrogen, solar, transportation, wind, and water. - [Wave Energy Gets Ready for a Big First](https://www.nrel.gov/news/program/2023/wave-energy-gets-ready-for-a-big-first.html) Sept. 8, 2023 - [NREL's Annual Partner Forum Eyes Pathways to Future Energy Systems](https://www.nrel.gov/news/features/2023/nrels-annual-partner-forum-eyes-pathways-to-future-energy-systems.html) Sept. 7, 2023 - [Early-Career Researchers Gather in Grenoble, France, To Tackle Climate Change From a Global Perspective](https://www.nrel.gov/news/program/2023/early-career-researchers-gather-in-grenoble-france-to-tackle-climate-change-from-a-global-perspective.html) Sept. 7, 2023 - [Abhishek Roy's Research Is Insane in the Membrane](https://www.nrel.gov/news/program/2023/abhishek-roy-research-is-insane-in-the-membrane.html) Sept. 7, 2023 [Spring 2023 Solar Industry Update](https://www.nrel.gov/docs/fy23osti/86215.pdf) [The 2030 National Charging Network: Estimating U.S. Light-Duty Demand Electric Vehicle Charging Infrastructure](https://www.nrel.gov/docs/fy23osti/85970.pdf) [The 2030 National Charging Network: Estimating U.S. Light-Duty Demand Vehicle Charging Infrastructure](https://www.nrel.gov/docs/fy23osti/85654.pdf) [SolarAPP+ Performance Review
